name: F Your Love
content: Wish I could go back in time
And wipe all your kisses off
And you cheated on my heart
所以现在我认为是时候了
从我的眼中我看不到他们
And so I had to make you cry
所以我不得不使你哭泣
And this is the hardest part
我告诉过你绝不要伤心
I know it's easier said than done
我知道说起来容易做起来难
But I'm saying F your love
You wanted to run and hide
And hang up on my calls
And put this in a song
After I show you who's the boss
在我告诉你谁是老板时
从我的眼中我看不到他们
And so I had to make you cry
所以我不得不使你哭泣
And this is the hardest part
我告诉过你绝不要伤心
I know it's easier said than done
我知道说起来容易做起来难
But I'm saying F your love
从我的眼中我看不到他们
And so I had to make you cry
所以我不得不使你哭泣
And so I had to make you cry
所以我不得不使你哭泣
And so I had to make you cry
所以我不得不使你哭泣
And this is the hardest part
我告诉过你绝不要伤心
I know it's easier said than done
我知道说起来容易做起来难
But I'm saying F your love
